website_summaries.verdict: Made of lightweight aluminum, this 24-inch cruiser bike features a step-through frame and an attractive design.
pros: An affordable cruiser bike for riders roughly ages 10 to 12
Comfortable seat with no-tool design for easy adjustments
Included basket allows the rider to bring along any necessities without compromising balance or safety
cons: Other than a rare model getting a little banged up in shipping, there are no major complaints about this bike

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable ride
customer_reviews.text: This bike is great. A little hard for me to put together by myself but now that it is put together I love it. 24 inch is just the right size for me (5'2").
customer_reviews.author: Kathryn Laskowski

customer_reviews.title: Perfect bike for me
customer_reviews.text: 24" is the size I need for my 5'5" frame so I can put my feet down without tilting the bike. Replaced the little girl basket with a Nantucket rattan basket to make it look more adult. Came pretty much pre assembled - just had to connect the big pieces. Comfortable seat. Handle bar and seat adjustable for the best ride around beach town. Love it! Additional information - after a few weeks of use noticing the paint on the handlebars chips easily. Be careful to avoid chipping. I covered with clear nail polish to prevent the chips from getting worse.
customer_reviews.author: Spartacus

customer_reviews.title: Good (but heavy) girl's bike
customer_reviews.text: I'm not a bike snob, but I do ride a Cannondale and a Giant adult's bike. By comparison this bike is heavy, especially since it is aluminum. It shipped quickly, was well packed, and had great assembly instructions. Speaking of assembly, it could not have been much easier - saddle, handle bars, pedals, and front tire. All I needed was an a allen wrench and 2 box ends, 10 minutes tops. Very good choice for a child that will outgrow this in a year or 2 - then we can upgrade to a higher end.
customer_reviews.author: Heath Sellers

customer_reviews.title: Smooth ride and attractive look!
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for my very tall 9 year old daughter, the color and basket are youthful and feminine, she can control the easy one speed and it allows for a confident smooth ride. A perfect upgrade from her 20in bike. Assembly was easy enough and the quality is good for the price. Only negative is the brackets for the basket were loose and fell out on a ride, but we came up with an easy solution to keep the basket secure without brackets. Would purchase again!
customer_reviews.author: H.R. Ohio

customer_reviews.title: Super nice bike for 5 ft preteen girl at park or beach.
customer_reviews.text: One suprised happy 11 year old Christmas morning. Nice well made bike. It took 30 minutes and directions were pretty good. All parts were separated and sorted nice. My granddaughter is 5 foot tall and the seat can adjust a little higher if needed in the future. Great bike for beach or park.
customer_reviews.author: Jenny Gault

customer_reviews.title: Do not buy this bike!!
customer_reviews.text: Do not buy this bike! 5 months after buying this bike and my daughter using it....the bike tire has stopped moving, it makes a horrible schreeching sound, and a bike repair shop told us it is probably the bearings going bad. I am sad that this bike did not last long. I contacted the seller, and 3 weeks later have not heard a thing from them. Because it is after 90 days I don’t think I can get my money back. A bike should last longer than 5 months!!
customer_reviews.author: Carly R Meers

customer_reviews.title: Pretty good for price
customer_reviews.text: I bought two of this bike for my twin daughter's 10th birthday and they love them. The assembly is pretty easy and they look nice. I'm having trouble keeping the seat tightened enough to remain straight and I wish there were a handlebar brake instead of the peddle but all-in-all it's probably the best bike for the price on the current market.
customer_reviews.author: Brenda Di Bari

customer_reviews.title: Shipping was great
customer_reviews.text: Dilivery time was excillent and it is shipped in strong card container no damage quality of tires are straight as can be , simple and easy to put together , high quality bike ,
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great bike
customer_reviews.text: Great bike for the money! I think it is a great value, much better than anything at Walmart. Easy to assemble.
customer_reviews.author: Matt

customer_reviews.title: Excellent bike
customer_reviews.text: Granddaughter, 9, is enamored of it. Bike arrived very promptly and in perfect condition. Seems very sturdy and well-built. My son and even my daugter-in-law approve of it - Can hardly get a better recommendation! Would buy again for younger child when she needs one.
customer_reviews.author: S. Rennie

customer_reviews.title: THIS IS NOT A 24” BIKE
customer_reviews.text: The bike is nice and the kids loved it. BUT when they wore a hole in the front tire, I have not been able to find a replacement. The tire size is somewhere between 22 inch and 24 inch. So be wary. THIS IS NOT A 24” BIKE.
customer_reviews.author: Roger Bruchay

customer_reviews.title: Very nice looking bike
customer_reviews.text: Easy assembly! I’ve built countless bikes for my kids over the years. Smoothest one yet. Even comes with a kickstand
customer_reviews.author: J. McIntyre

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful bike. My granddaughter loves it.
customer_reviews.text: The weld on the front fender was not perfect, but seems to be holding together. It's a beautiful bike and my granddaughter loves it. Overall, a very nice bike.
customer_reviews.author: Terry

customer_reviews.title: Excellent bike color and style
customer_reviews.text: Easy to put together. Great seller. Bike was delivered faster than expected. We loved the color and design.
customer_reviews.author: para Gavalas

customer_reviews.title: After 7 months it can't be ridden anymore
customer_reviews.text: Wheel bearings or something! Took it to one bike shop, unable to fix. Will be trying another, as my daughter really loves this bike.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Cheaply made
customer_reviews.text: Looks good but not worth the money. Four months after the purchase pedal fell of and its stripped so I can’t fix it. Very disappointing.
customer_reviews.author: Natalia Walsh

customer_reviews.title: waste my time and energy
customer_reviews.text: defect product! the front fork has been welded to the frame in wrong direction.
customer_reviews.author: Kathy

customer_reviews.title: Good bike for the price.
customer_reviews.text: My daughter really likes this bike. The seat is super comfy. The paint comes off easily if it falls but otherwise it rides well.
customer_reviews.author: Jill K. Reynolds

customer_reviews.title: Likes it so much
customer_reviews.text: I bought this bike for my daughter. She likes it so much. Happy with the purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Mandy

customer_reviews.title: The best looking bike in the neighborhood
customer_reviews.text: Awesome bike! My 10 y.o. daughter loves it. She said it’s very easy and comfortable to ride.
customer_reviews.author: Michelle D Morettini

customer_reviews.title: I don't like it
customer_reviews.text: I bought this bike b/c of good review but not that much
customer_reviews.author: Meron

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: This the best bilke for me. It is esay to ride.
customer_reviews.author: Andrea W.

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Perfect beach bike my granddaughter loves it. Had handbrakes attached too!!!
customer_reviews.author: "patti"

product_meta.title: Kent 24" Girls', La Jolla Cruiser Bike, Light Blue, For Ages 12 and Up
product_meta.description:
The La Jolla 24 inch cruiser is just the right size for a growing teen or a petite lady. It is a full featured adult bicycle, just at a scaled down size for easier handling. The low step through aluminum frame makes for easy on and off. The comfortable seat and matching chainguard sport a classy plaid design. The quick release seat adjustment requires no tools and allows the bicycle to grow with a teen as well as accommodate several different riders. The fenders keep riders dry and clean and the pretty basket is perfect for a purse, cell phone or any other necessities. 


Great news! If you select Site to Store delivery, you can call your local store as complimentary assembly may be offered at that location.
feature_bullets: Lightweight aluminum step through frameSturdy 24" steel wheels with classy whitewall tires

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.4 out of 5 stars80 ratings4.4 out of 5 stars
